price: I njih dvojica krenuše. I kad se u lađu ukrcaše, onaj je probuši. “Zar je probuši da potopiš one koji na njoj plove? Učinio si, doista, nešto vrlo krupno!”
arabic: فَٱنطَلَقَا حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا رَكِبَا فِي ٱلسَّفِينَةِ خَرَقَهَاۖ قَالَ أَخَرَقۡتَهَا لِتُغۡرِقَ أَهۡلَهَا لَقَدۡ جِئۡتَ شَيۡـًٔا إِمۡرٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fa-inṭalaqā ḥattā idhā rakibā fī al-safīnati kharaqahā qāla akharaqtahā litugh'riqa ahlahā laqad ji'ta shayan im'ran
translations: he made a hole in it
Have you made a hole in it
